name: ShinobiClash
description:
Controls: WSAD

Speed: SHIFT

Jump : BACKSPACE

EquipWeapon: E

DropWeapon: Q

There are 7 types of weapons each has own super abillity and effect be sure to test them all :) (Kunai, Dagger, Staff, TwinBlade,Shuriken,Magic Orb,Katana )

This  firstperson arena shooter/survial was made in 3 days (48 hours to be specifed) to GJ where theme was anime. Game is playable but has a quite amout of bugs (and there no options to adjust the game yet) but i want to you guys to test it to see what can improment in future,This is my Second game ever created and i learned a lot of new things. So enjoy,and have fun:) P.S it looks like Serious Sam from Wish :D
